name: Unity-Meshsaver
tagline: A C# Editor Script that allows you to save a usable Mesh .asset file into your project.
body:
### This is Unity-MeshSaver
Just plop this script into an Editor folder in your project and you can then right-click on MeshFilter components and save meshes from there.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
